channel.title: How do i add items to my shops
channel.description: Hi how do i add some items to my shops?

item.title: How do i add items to my shops
item.dc:creator: @Treber Treber
item.description:
@Treber wrote:

Well, most sources have a shops.cfg or something similar.

Open that .cfg file and find the name of the shop you wish to edit.

NOTE: If the shop is called “Shop 1” for example search “Shop_1” not “Shop 1”.

The item ids are on the left and the item amount in the shop is on the right

Ex) 4151 100

That is 100 whips in the shop. If you add another item, be sure you tab the item id and amount to fit with all the others.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add items to my shops
